001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.secrets.providers;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.secrets.spi.SecretsProvider;
004
005import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
006import java.util.Optional;
007
008public class EnvSecretsProvider
009        implements SecretsProvider {
010    @Override
011    public String getSecretString(String name) {
012        return Optional.ofNullable(System.getenv(name))
013                .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("No such environment variable:" + name));
014    }
015}
